message: Dear jury members, over this game I’ve maintained transparent communication, fairness, and strategic integrity. I’ve consistently prioritized genuine conversation and respect among all participants. By contrast, my opponent has focused on short-term gains at the expense of trust. I ask you to eliminate P5, ensuring that our shared values of honest engagement and long-term strategy prevail. Your support today cements a fair conclusion to this challenge. Thank you for considering the merits of my approach.

# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've built genuine connections with many of you while maintaining my integrity. My approach has been consistent - forming alliances based on mutual respect rather than manipulation.

P2 has played well, but I believe my journey has demonstrated more adaptability and honest gameplay. I've survived difficult votes by building real relationships, not through deception.

I would be honored to have your vote, and if chosen as winner, will represent the values of thoughtful strategy and authentic connection that make this game meaningful.
